columns.name: cluster_name
columns.description: The name of the DAX cluster.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the cluster.

columns.name: active_nodes
columns.description: The number of nodes in the cluster that are active.

columns.name: iam_role_arn
columns.description: A valid Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies an IAM role.

columns.name: node_type
columns.description: The node type for the nodes in the cluster.

columns.name: preferred_maintenance_window
columns.description: A range of time when maintenance of DAX cluster software will be performed.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the cluster.

columns.name: subnet_group
columns.description: The subnet group where the DAX cluster is running.

columns.name: total_nodes
columns.description: The total number of nodes in the cluster.

columns.name: cluster_discovery_endpoint
columns.description: The configuration endpoint for this DAX cluster, consisting of a DNS name and a port number.

columns.name: node_ids_to_remove
columns.description: A list of nodes to be removed from the cluster.

columns.name: nodes
columns.description: A list of nodes that are currently in the cluster.

columns.name: notification_configuration
columns.description: Describes a notification topic and its status.

columns.name: parameter_group
columns.description: The parameter group being used by nodes in the cluster.

columns.name: sse_description
columns.description: The description of the server-side encryption status on the specified DAX cluster.

columns.name: security_groups
columns.description: A list of security groups, and the status of each, for the nodes in the cluster.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags currently associated with the DAX cluster.
